footer.description: Tradex is the most trusted cryptocurrency trading platform, offering advanced tools and top-tier security. Our mission is to create the best trading experience and give our clients the freedom to trade without limitations.
footer.company_info: Tradex is the trading name of Raw Trading Ltd, which is regulated by the Seychelles Financial Services Authority (FSA) with Securities Dealer’s license number SD016.
footer.risk_warning: Risk Warning: Trading Forex and CFDs carries a high level of risk to your capital and you should only trade with money you can afford to lose. Trading Forex and CFDs may not be suitable for all investors.
footer.execution_notice: Trade execution, pricing, speed, and account access may be affected by a variety of factors including market volatility, order size and type, trading volume, and system performance. During periods of high market activity or limited system availability, delays in account access and trade execution may occur. Investors should be aware of these risks and plan accordingly when placing trades.
footer.age_restriction: You must be 18 years old, or of legal age as determined in your country.

about.title: About TradeX
about.subtitle: Pioneering decentralized autonomous exchanges through multi-dimensional blockchain protocols and synthetic asset generation.
about.missionText: To architect the first truly autonomous digital economy where smart contracts orchestrate seamless value transfer across infinite parallel blockchain dimensions.
about.whoText: Visionary blockchain mathematicians, cryptographic engineers, and distributed systems pioneers crafting self-governing financial protocols that transcend traditional boundaries.
about.whyText: Cross-chain liquidity mining and automated market synthesis create infinite trading pairs while our recursive smart contracts eliminate counterparty risk through mathematical guarantees.
about.value1Text: Self-executing DAOs with evolutionary consensus mechanisms that adapt trading rules based on collective intelligence and market sentiment analysis.
about.value2Text: Create and trade virtual assets backed by real-world value through our proprietary reality-bridging protocols and oracle network integration.
about.value3Text: Fractal blockchain architecture processes unlimited transactions through recursive sharding and multi-dimensional state management systems.

security.securityDescription: Advanced quantum cryptography and biometric authentication systems safeguard your digital wealth with unprecedented security measures designed for the future of finance.
security.feature1Description: Unbreakable quantum entanglement protocols secure your private keys using photon-based communication channels that detect any interception attempts instantly.
security.feature2Description: Behavioral biometrics combined with hardware security modules create a unique identity fingerprint that adapts to your trading patterns and device signatures.
security.feature3Description: AI-powered threat analysis monitors global attack vectors in real-time, predicting and neutralizing security risks before they can impact your assets.

whatIs.title: Defining Digital Currency
whatIs.text: Digital coins represent value transferred electronically using encryption methods. They run on peer-to-peer networks without central authorities.

blockchain.title: Blockchain Technology Explained
blockchain.text: Think of blockchain as a chain of records where every transaction is verified and stored across many computers globally.

popular.title: Top Digital Coins
popular.bitcoin: The pioneer cryptocurrency that started it all.
popular.ethereum: A platform enabling decentralized applications through smart contracts.
popular.cardano: Focuses on scalability and sustainability for blockchain networks.

buy.title: Steps to Acquire Crypto
buy.step1: Select a secure platform such as Kraken or Gemini.
buy.step2: Register and complete the verification process.
buy.step3: Add funds via bank account or credit card.
buy.step4: Purchase your chosen cryptocurrency and transfer it to a private wallet.

tips.title: Crypto Safety Guidelines
tips.tip1: Activate multi-factor authentication on all accounts.
tips.tip2: Keep your private keys offline in cold storage.
tips.tip3: Stay informed about market trends and news.
tips.tip4: Be cautious of unsolicited offers and giveaways.

section1.title: Smart Contract Agreement
section1.description: By interacting with our decentralized finance protocol, you agree to be bound by these immutable smart contract terms. All transactions are executed automatically without human intervention, ensuring complete transparency and trustless operations.

section2.title: Yield Farming Risks
section2.description: Liquidity provision and yield farming involve significant financial risks including impermanent loss, smart contract vulnerabilities, and market volatility. Users must conduct thorough research before staking tokens in any liquidity pools.

section3.title: Governance Token Rights
section3.description: Holders of our governance tokens have voting rights on protocol upgrades, fee structures, and treasury management. Voting power is proportional to token holdings and delegation is permitted through our governance interface.

section4.title: Cross-Chain Bridge Security
section4.description: Our multi-chain infrastructure utilizes advanced cryptographic proofs to ensure secure asset transfers between networks. Bridge contracts undergo regular security audits by leading blockchain security firms.

section5.title: Automated Market Maker Operations
section5.description: Our AMM utilizes constant product formulas to determine token prices based on supply and demand. Slippage tolerance and price impact are calculated automatically to protect users from unfavorable trades.

section6.title: Flash Loan Protocols
section6.description: Flash loans enable uncollateralized borrowing within single transactions. These loans must be repaid within the same block, enabling arbitrage opportunities and complex DeFi strategies without requiring initial capital.

section7.title: Staking Rewards Distribution
section7.description: Staking rewards are distributed proportionally based on token holdings and lock-up periods. Rewards accumulate continuously and can be claimed at any time, subject to network transaction fees.

section8.title: Protocol Fee Structure
section8.description: Transaction fees are automatically distributed between liquidity providers, protocol treasury, and token burn mechanisms. Fee structures may be modified through governance proposals and community voting.

fundAccount.question: How do I fund my account?
fundAccount.answer: You can fund your account via bank transfer, credit card, or cryptocurrency deposit. Bank transfers typically take 1-2 business days, while crypto deposits are usually instant after network confirmation.

tradingFees.question: What are your trading fees?
tradingFees.answer: Our fee structure is transparent and competitive. Spot trading fees start at 0.1% for makers and 0.15% for takers. Futures trading fees are as low as 0.02% for makers. Volume discounts are available for high-frequency traders.

withdrawals.question: How long do withdrawals take?
withdrawals.answer: Cryptocurrency withdrawals are processed within 30 minutes during business hours. Bank withdrawals typically take 1-3 business days depending on your bank and location.

insurance.question: Is my account insured?
insurance.answer: Yes, we maintain comprehensive insurance coverage for digital assets and operational risks. Additionally, fiat deposits are protected by FDIC insurance up to $250,000 per account.

securityTips.title: Account Security Tips
securityTips.tip1: Enable two-factor authentication on your account
securityTips.tip2: Use a unique, strong password with a password manager
securityTips.tip3: Never share your login credentials with anyone
securityTips.tip4: Regularly review your account activity and statements
securityTips.tip5: Contact support immediately if you notice suspicious activity

audits.title: Security Audits
audits.description: Our systems undergo quarterly security audits by leading cybersecurity firms including Deloitte and PwC. All audit reports are available upon request.

Privacy.title: Privacy Policy
Privacy.description: This privacy policy explains how we handle your data while you create, buy, sell, and trade non-fungible tokens on our decentralized marketplace.

section1.title: NFT and Digital Asset Data
section1.description: We collect and process various types of data related to your NFT activities:
list: **Digital Artwork Metadata:** Image files, descriptions, attributes, and creator information.
**Ownership Records:** Blockchain-verified ownership history and provenance tracking.
**Royalty Information:** Creator royalty percentages and automated payment distributions.
**Collection Analytics:** Trading volume, floor prices, and market performance metrics.

section2.title: Marketplace Analytics and Curation
section2.description: We use your NFT data to enhance the marketplace experience through:
list: AI-powered content moderation and authenticity verification.
Personalized NFT recommendations based on collecting patterns.
Market trend analysis and price prediction algorithms.
Rarity scoring and trait analysis for collection valuation.
Creator spotlight features and community building tools.
Anti-fraud detection for counterfeit and stolen artwork.
Metaverse integration and virtual gallery experiences.

section3.title: Creator and Collector Networks
section3.description: Your data may be shared within our creative ecosystem:
list: **Artist Collaborations:** For joint collections and cross-promotional activities.
**Metaverse Platforms:** For displaying NFTs in virtual worlds and games.
**Social Media Integration:** For sharing collections and market achievements.
**Gallery Partnerships:** For physical and digital exhibition opportunities.

section4.title: IPFS and Decentralized Storage
section4.description: NFT metadata and artwork are stored on IPFS and other decentralized networks to ensure permanence and censorship resistance.

section5.title: Creator and Collector Rights
section5.description: As a participant in our NFT ecosystem, you have the right to:
list: Control over your creator profile and portfolio presentation.
Access to detailed analytics about your NFT performance and sales.
Ability to set and modify royalty percentages for secondary sales.
Option to migrate NFTs to other compatible marketplaces.
Participation in community governance and platform decision-making.
Export of collection data and transaction history for tax purposes.

section6.title: AI Content Analysis
section6.description: We use machine learning algorithms to analyze artwork for style classification, authenticity verification, and content moderation.

section7.title: Third-Party NFT Platforms
section7.description: We may integrate with other NFT marketplaces, virtual worlds, and blockchain games for cross-platform compatibility.

section8.title: Smart Contract Upgrades
section8.description: Changes to NFT smart contracts and marketplace functionality will be announced to creators and collectors in advance.

section9.title: Creator Support
section9.description: For privacy questions related to your NFT creations and sales, contact us through:

Cookie.title: Cookie Usage Notice
Cookie.description: Learn how we use cookies to optimize your experience, personalize content, and analyze traffic.

section1.title: Understanding Cookies
section1.text: Cookies are snippets of data stored on your browser that help websites recognize you on future visits. They're essential for customizing user experience, maintaining sessions, and improving website performance.

section2.title: Our Cookie Categories
items: Core Cookies: These ensure site security and navigation. Without them, our site simply won’t work.
Experience Cookies: Help remember preferences like dark mode, region, or font size.
Metrics Cookies: Track performance anonymously so we can fix bugs and improve features.
Ad Cookies: Tailor promotional content you might see based on your interests.

section3.title: External Cookie Providers
section3.text: We partner with services like Google, Meta, or analytics tools that may place their own cookies to track how you use our site, measure engagement, or deliver ads elsewhere.

section4.title: Customize Cookie Settings
section4.text: Most browsers let you block or delete cookies in their settings. If you block all cookies, some features of our site may not function as expected.

section5.title: Consent & Choices
section5.text: By browsing this site, you agree to our use of cookies. You can withdraw your consent at any time by clearing cookies or adjusting your browser preferences.

section6.title: Updates to This Notice
section6.text: We may revise this cookie notice from time to time. The most current version will always be available on this page.

items.0: How to Mint Your First NFT

q1.question: What chains does Tradex support?
q1.answer: Currently we support Ethereum, Avalanche, Base, and Solana.

q2.question: How do I mint an NFT?
q2.answer: Head to the 'Mint' tab, upload your asset, and follow the guided process.

q3.question: Is there a mobile app?
q3.answer: Yes, Tradex mobile is available on iOS and Android with full Web3 wallet support.

q4.question: What is Tradex AI?
q4.answer: It’s our machine-learning tool that analyzes market sentiment and on-chain data for real-time alerts.

privacy.title: Privacy Policy
privacy.intro: Your privacy is important to us. This policy explains how we collect, use, disclose, and safeguard your information.

1.title: Information We Collect
1.content: We collect various types of information in connection with the services we provide, including:

items.personal: Personal Information: Information you provide directly, such as your name, email address, and contact details.
items.usage: Usage Data: How you access and use our services including IP address, browser, and visit details.
items.device: Device Information: Hardware model, OS, and unique device identifiers.

2.title: How We Use Your Information
2.content: We use your information to operate, maintain, improve our services, communicate with you, and prevent fraud.

3.title: Information Sharing and Disclosure
3.content: We may share your information with service providers, for legal reasons, during business transfers, or with your consent.

q1.question: How do I integrate with your API?
q1.answer: Our API is RESTful and can be integrated using standard HTTP methods. Refer to the API Reference section for detailed examples.

q2.question: What are the API rate limits?
q2.answer: Our API has a default rate limit of 100 requests per minute per API key. Higher limits can be requested for Enterprise plans.
